text: Ezɨ Elaija mɨghsɨam ategha uamategha Israelɨn nguazimɨn ghua, Safatɨn otarim Elisan api. A 11plan gumazir igharaziba ko azenim gutui. Gumaziba vaghvagha bulmakaun pumuning ko ingari. Me bar moghɨra 24plan bulmakauba abɨrima da nguazim abɨzir biziba mɨkɨrvasi. Ezɨ 11plan gumazir kaba uan bulmakauba ko faragha zui, ezɨ Elisa uan bulmakaun pumuning ko, me gɨn izi. Ezɨ Elaija, Elisa bagha ghua, uan korotiar ruarim suegha Elisa garu.
